title: Shinobi Infiltrator armor
summaries: Shinobi Infiltrator armor is a Hardmode, post-Golem armor set purchased from the Tavernkeep for 1500000*150 [img:Defender Medal] in total, and provides summon as well as melee damage bonuses. The set consists of the Shinobi Infiltrator's Helmet, Shinobi Infiltrator's Torso, and Shinobi Infiltrator's Pants.
A full set of Shinobi Infiltrator armor will provide the following stats:

• +54 defense
  • +20% melee damage
  • +20% melee speed
  • +60% summon damage
  • +25% melee critical strike chance
  • +30% movement speed
  • +3 extra sentry slots

Additionally, wearing the full set will increase the attack rate of <linked>Lightning Aura</linked> sentries, will cause them to deal <linked>critical hits</linked> with a fixed 25% chance, and will increase their radius by 4 tiles.
The Shinobi Infiltrator armor can be considered a direct upgrade of the <linked>Monk armor</linked>.
